about_the_game:
Rise to the top in no time with the Arisen Pack - a best-value bundle filled with high tier rewards and a whole month's worth of Bonus XP. It's the perfect treat to thrust yourself to mastery!

This pack includes all the content of the Zealot Pack DLC with extra rewards.

Full content of this DLC:
- A Legendary Dragon Skin for the Phantom
- An Epic Dragon Skin for the Windguard
- An Epic Dragon Skin for the Marauder
- 3,000 Gems
- A full epic outfit for the Phantom
- A Legendary helmet for the Windguard
- A Legendary helmet for the Marauder
- An Epic weapon for the Windguard
- An Epic weapon for the Marauder
- A 30-day xp booster
- 3 banners, player titles, profile wallpapers and player icons

Please be cautious!! Purchasing this pack will prevent you from acquiring the contents of another DLC pack.
This pack is not eligible for a refund.

Rise to the top in no time with the Arisen Pack - a best-value bundle filled with high tier rewards and a whole month's worth of Bonus XP. It's the perfect treat to thrust yourself to mastery!

This pack includes all the content of the Zealot Pack DLC with extra rewards.

Please be cautious!! Purchasing this pack will prevent you from acquiring the contents of another DLC pack.

name: Century - Arisen Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6Ghz or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760 or AMD RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.8Ghz or AMD Ryzen 5 3.2Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Rise to the top in no time with the Arisen Pack - a best-value bundle filled with high tier rewards and a whole month's worth of Bonus XP. It's the perfect treat to thrust yourself to mastery!
supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, French, Japanese
